author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Sagat Gameplay Trailer for Street Fighter 6, the latest addition to the classic fighting game franchise developed by Capcom. Players can take a look at the first character being added to the roster for Year 3, as Sagat returns to the fight. Take a look at the latest trailer to see Sagat in action and get familiar with his moves, abilities, and techniques he'll bring to the game. Sagat is launching into Street Fighter 6 on August 5 as part of the 'Sagat Arrives!' Fighting Pass for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #StreetFighter6
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Sagat Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Beat 'Em Up Collection (QUByte Classics) brings together seven intense side-scrolling action games in a retro-fueled compilation. From ancient legends to dystopian futures, punch, kick, and slash your way through waves of enemies in pure 16-bit style. Check out the Beat 'Em Up Collection (QUByte Classics) trailer to see what to expect. Beat 'Em Up Collection (QUByte Classics) will be available on Steam, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch on July 17, 2025.
title: Beat 'Em Up Collection (QUByte Classics) - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Bungie's latest expansion for Destiny 2, The Edge of Fate, is here. We jump into the first mission which brings us to Earth to investigate an anomoly that turns out to be an invitation leading guardians to Kepler, a planetoid located within the Sol solar system. Here's the first 32 Minutes of Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate.
title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate - First 34 Minutes of Gamelpay

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Payday Collaboration Trailer for The Division 2, the hit third-person cover shooter developed by Ubisoft. Players can now claim four iconic character looks from the Payday Gang, Dallas, Chains, Jiro, and Sangres. The Payday Collaboration is available now in The Division 2 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Division 2 x Payday - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Early Access Release Date Trailer for Frosthaven, an online turn-based action roguelike RPG developed by Snapshot Games. Players will explore the dark fantasy nature of the hit game, based on the board game, packed with new character classes, playstyles, abilities, and more. Manage resources, dispatch menacing enemies, and trek through diverse environments across the campaign. Frosthaven is launching into Early Access on July 31 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#Frosthaven #Gaming #IGN
title: Frosthaven - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
San Diego Comic-Con is almost here! Get ready for an epic time at the biggest entertainment and comics event of the year. IGN is back with two days of livestreams to cover the event – from exclusive interviews with celebrities to live coverage on the show floor to check out the coolest collectibles – you won't want to miss it! 

Tune in July 25 and 26 at 3pm PT on IGN platforms for coverage of it all.

#IGN #SDCC #SanDiegoComicCon
title: IGN Is Back at San Diego Comic-Con for 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Borderlands Bundles Trailer for Rainbow Six Siege X, the latest iteration of the tactical multiplayer first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft. Players can take on a more Pandora-inspired look with the Borderlands Bundles, with new cosmetics inspired by the hit Gearbox-developed series. The Borderlands Bundles feature IQ as the Firehawk and Mozzie as a Psycho to add a fresh look to the Operators. The Borderlands Bundles are available now in Rainbow Six Siege X for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#RainbowSixSiegeX #Borderlands #Gaming
title: Rainbow Six Siege X - Official Borderlands Bundles Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Project Diarchy' Season 4 Gameplay Trailer for The Outlast Trials, an action online co-op horror game developed by Red Barrels. The new season for The Outlast Trials is packed with new content for fans to enjoy, including New Prime Assets with Otto and Arora Kress, a new environment with The Shopping Mall, a new limited-time event with the Kress Twins, and more. 'Project Diarchy' Season 4 for The Outlast Trials is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#TheOutlastTrials #Gaming #IGN
title: The Outlast Trials - Official 'Project Diarchy' Season 4 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Travel back in time to the legendary crusades for the holy land, in this expanded definitive edition of Stronghold Crusader! Engage in historical desert skirmishes reimagined with new gameplay content and upgraded visuals.
Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition expands on the original game with 8 new playable units, 4 fresh AI lords to face off against and several additional campaigns. Play alone in 2 new historical campaigns and 4 'Sands of Time' skirmish trails or team up with a friend in the all-new co-op trail!
Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition is launching on July 15 for PC.

#StrongholdCrusaderDefinitiveEdition #IGN  #Gaming
title: Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Introducing Agent of Strange, a new narrative sandbox thriller with a distinct art style that's set in an early 20th century city that's sealed off from rest of the world – thus subjecting you and the rest of the populace to forbidden rituals, bizarre laws, and a reshaped reality. It's due out for PC in 2026. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3855850/Agent_of_Strange

#IGN #Gaming
title: Agent of Strange - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary adds three more days to its Summer 2025 re-release. Check out the new Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary re-release trailer to see the announcement that this original 1990 superhero film of the comic book adaptation starring the iconic characters Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael, is now scheduled for five consecutive blockbuster days. The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary re-release is coming to theatres August 16-20, 2025.

From New Line Cinema and directed by the legendary film and music video director Steve Barron, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary will also present the Turtles Unmasked featurette. Produced in collaboration with the creators of TMNT: Evolution, Mutation & Reboot, the featurette showcases before the movie—never-before-seen footage from the archives, extended scenes left to history on the cutting room floor, home-recorded behind-the-scenes footage, and 1-on-1 time and comme
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary Re-Release - Official Trailer #2

author: IGN
description: There is no denying that Worship feels good to play. That its minimalist art style looks beautiful. That the music is gorgeous. That it forces you to play smart, to use every resource. But I like that the last thing it did was make me feel bad. I am a cult leader serving a dark god. I will do nothing good with the power I gain. Winning shouldn’t feel good. And I am glad Worship understands that. Previewed by Will Borger
title: Worship: Be a Cult Leader in this Pikmin-Inspired Roguelite

author: IGN
description:
Get your final look at the cozy farming sim adventure Gaucho and the Grassland ahead of its July 16 release date for PC. Gaucho and the Grassland lets you live as a Latin cowboy, "exploring the vast grasslands, the cozy highlands, the beach, and a magical world, helping locals and mystical beings to turn the world into a more harmonious place." Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670830/Gaucho_and_the_Grassland/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Gaucho and the Grassland - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Tamer Town announcement trailer for this creature-collector city-builder game. Meet cool creatures, see city-building elements, and more in this Tamer Town trailer. Collect Mokitons in this unique city management game, where tamers with their monsters unite in battle, evolve and bond together in their unique town. As the city’s manager, assign Mokitons to specialized tasks, optimize workflows, and unlock advanced buildings through smart, strategic planning. Tamer Town will be available in Steam Early Access in Q2 2026, and on consoles ( PC (Windows), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch 2) with Steam 1.0 version in Q1 2027.

In Tamer Town, your creatures don't just fight - they pitch in. They build the city with you. Each Mokiton can be assigned to a job based on its strengths: powering buildings, gathering resources, boosting productivity, or even creating elemental harmony in neighborhoods. The happier your Mokitons are, the better your cit
title: Tamer Town (Pokemon-Like City Builder) - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Thula Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, the upcoming fighting game based on the Invincible IP, developed by Quarter Up. Thula is a ferocious Viltrumite fitted with a coveted Braid Blade, allowing for acrobatic, fast moves that pack a punch. Get the rundown on Thula's moves, abilities, and techniques with the developers for Invincible VS, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Invincible VS - Official Thula Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Bulletproof Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, an upcoming fighting game developed by Quarter Up. Bulletproof aka Zandale Randolph is a more free-flow hand-to-hand fighter with agile air mobility in combat alongside a flashy, stylized gameplay style. Get the rundown from the developers on how best to play Bulletproof in Invincible VS, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Invincible VS - Official Bulletproof Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Invincible Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, an upcoming fighting game developed by Quarter Up. Players can get the rundown on the Invincible's move set, abilities, and how they adapted the character from the comics and show straight from the developers at Quarter Up. Dominate the opposition as Invincible in Invincible VS, coming in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Invincible VS - Official Invincible Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Warning: This trailer has flashing and quick cuts using flashes.

Take a look at the Announcement Trailer for The Razorform, an action top-down shooter developed by Niles Sankey. Players will shoot their way through a classified research lab that releases the Razorform, a time-warping construct that bleeds nightmares and chaos in its wake. Uncover military secrets, make use of firearms to melee-based weapons, and explore an atmospheric sci-fi adventure. The Razorform is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Razorform - Official Announcement Trailer (Warning: Flashing Lights)
